Plot Dose-Level Configuration for Phase II Scenarios

Source: R/plot_doses.R
plot_doses.Rd

Plot Dose-Level Configuration for Phase II Scenarios

plot_doses(
  dose_scenarios,
  dose_labels,
  ed50_value = NULL,
  ed90_value = NULL,
  recommended_doses = NULL,
  tablet_strengths = NULL,
  show_y_axis = TRUE
)

Arguments

dose_scenarios

A named list of numeric vectors, each representing a dose scenario.

dose_labels

A named character vector with human-readable descriptions for each scenario.

ed50_value

Numeric value indicating ED50 dose.

ed90_value

Numeric value indicating ED90 dose.

recommended_doses

Optional numeric vector of recommended or anchor doses to highlight.

show_y_axis

Logical; if FALSE and dose_labels are provided, hides y-axis labels.

dose_strengths

Optional numeric vector for vertical reference lines (e.g. available tablets).

Value

A ggplot object

Examples

dose_scenarios <- list(
  doses_1 = c(0, 5, 60, 160),
  doses_2 = c(0, 10, 60, 160),
  doses_3 = c(0, 40, 80, 160),
  doses_4 = c(0, 20, 60, 160),
  doses_5 = c(0, 10, 20, 60, 160)
)

dose_labels <- c(
  doses_1 = "One dose <ED50; wide spacing",
  doses_2 = "One dose ≈ED50; 3x & 6x multiples",
  doses_3 = "Broad intermediate range",
  doses_4 = "3x intervals from low tablet",
  doses_5 = "Added low dose near ED50"
)

plot_doses(
  dose_scenarios = dose_scenarios,
  dose_labels = dose_labels,
  ed50_value = 10,
  ed90_value = 50,
  recommended_doses = c(10, 160),
  dose_strengths = c(5, 10, 20, 40, 80),
  show_y_axis = FALSE
)
#> Error in plot_doses(dose_scenarios = dose_scenarios, dose_labels = dose_labels,     ed50_value = 10, ed90_value = 50, recommended_doses = c(10,         160), dose_strengths = c(5, 10, 20, 40, 80), show_y_axis = FALSE): could not find function "plot_doses"
